overview: Midday sun is frying the post-industrial landscape. Little Red Riding Hood is on her way to her grandmotherâ€™s cottage. She diverts the road and enters an abandoned factory building. In an empty concrete labyrinth, she discovers a black wall covered with a freshly painted graffiti - a large white flower. She exits the factory, proceeds on her way entering the dark forest. A Wolf halts her...
title: Red Riding Hood Redux
